successes.title: Chineasy: The easiest way to learn Chinese
successes.description: Chineasy: A bright and engaging illustrated methodology for learning Chinese through fun and whimsical illustrations.

Pledges.description: GOOD FENG SHUI Get a shout out on the Chineasy website and, of course, our eternal gratitude!

SCREEN SAVER SMALL Get a selection of 12 different characters as a screen saver slide-show that you can learn from as your computer rotates through them. Reinforce what you know and see how quickly you can remember them!
TEMPORARY TATTOO Ever wanted to know what you’d look like with a Chinese tattoo, well now you can! £5 will get a random temporary tattoo to impress all of your friends!

SCREEN SAVER LARGE Get a selection of 100 different characters as a screen saver slide-show that you can learn from as your computer rotates through them. Reinforce what you know and see how quickly you can remember them!
E-BOOK You'll get a digital copy of the Chineasy e-book as soon as it's completed!
EBOOK & LARGE SCREEN SAVER
CHINEASY FUN PACK Get a fun random Chineasy tattoo and an iphone 5 case of your choice
POSTER: Get one of our fun Chineasy posters 45.7cm x 61.0cm. Choose between: tall; short; The original 8 set; the nature set; the person set and the animal set
POSTCARD GIFT BOX You’ll receive a wonderful box featuring up to 100 ready to send Chineasy postcard (minus your messages, of course!)
FLASHCARD GIFT BOX: You’ll receive a box with up to 100 flashcards, featuring a non-illustrated and illustrated side to really help you memorise our charming characters
THE BOOK You’ll get a copy of our book. Featuring 192 pages of Chineasy goodness full of building blocks, compounds and phrases with handy explanations. Full spec: Paperback, 18x24cm
BOOK & LARGE SCREEN SAVER Want to reinforce what you read on your computer? Then get the standard book and a selection of 100 characters in a handy screen saver
FLASHCARDS & LARGE SCREEN SAVER. Reinforce what your memory both on your computer and in card form!
ELECTRONIC LEARNING Get a copy of the e-book and our flashcard box set
ELECTRONIC COMMUNICATION Get a copy of the e-book and our postcard box set
BOTH BOOKS Get a copy of the standard book and an ebook so you can enjoy one on your Kindle and one the old fashioned way!
BOX SET BUNDLE Get both types of Chineasy card box sets: Flashcards and Postcards. Share the learning while you are studying at home

THE FANCY BOOK Fancy! You’ll get a copy of our special edition book. Featuring 192 pages of Chineasy goodness full of building blocks, compounds and phrases with handy explanations. Full spec: Hardcover, Silk Finish,18x24cm
FLASHCARD & BOOK Get a copy of the standard book along with our flashcard boxset!
ELECTRONIC LEARNING DELUXE Get a copy of the e-book and our postcard & flashcard box sets.
EBOOK, STANDARD BOOK & FLASHCARDS
FANCY BOOK & EBOOK
EBOOK, STANDARD BOOK, FLASHCARDS & LARGE SCREEN SAVER

THE SIGNED BOOK Even fancier! Get a copy of our silk bound book signed by the creator, ShaoLan! Featuring 192 pages of Chineasy goodness full of building blocks, compounds and phrases with handy explanations. Full spec: Hardcover, Silk Finish,18x24cm
CHINEASY BUNDLE Get both box sets and the standard version of our book
FANCY BOOK & FLASHCARDS
FILL THE LIBRARY DELUXE Get a copy of the standard book, the fancy pants book and the e-book
FANCY BOOK, EBOOK, FLASHCARD
FANCY CHINEASY BUNDLE Get both box sets and the fancy version of our book
SIGNED CHINEASY BUNDLE Get both box sets and the fancy version of our book
THE PARTY BUNDLE Get both box sets, the fancy version of our book & a ticket to the Chineasy Chinese New Year party!

CUSTOM FRAMED CHINESE NAME ShaoLan will create a Chinese name for you based off of your personality and existing name. This will then be printed on a high quality paper, framed and shipped to you wherever you are in the world. This gift is custom one of a kind creation! You will also get a random tattoo!
DECK THE WALLS Get a unique Chineasy name  and all four poster sets (The original 8, Nature, Animals and Person)

THE WHOLE SHEBANG! EVERYTHING! All of the books, a selection of temporary tattoos, an I-phone 5 case of your choice, all of the posters, both box sets and of course your very own framed personal Chineasy name. You cant get more than this!
This reward is for a unique, one off work of original calligraphy by ShaoLan of the Tang Dynasty poem by Meng Haoran. It is totally original and unique. We will only sell one.
